[img]https://i.imgur.com/NOW7jU1.png[/img] [h1][b]NEW RIMCARDS TO COLLECT ![/b][/h1]
[h2][b]LEGENDARY[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Centipede[/b] [/list]
[h2][b]EPIC[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Auto Charge Blaster[/b] [*][b]Scyther[/b] [*][b]Weather Controller[/b] [/list]
[h2][b]RARE[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Mech Assembler[/b] [*][b]Lancer[/b] [*][b]Psychic Ship[/b] [*][b]Auto Inferno Turret[/b] [*][b]Pikeman[/b] [/list]
[h2][b]COMMON[/b][/h2] [list][*][b]Countdown Activator[/b] [*][b]Mini Slugger Turret[/b] [*][b]Proximity Activator[/b] [*][b]Barricade[/b] [*][b]Mortar Shield[/b] [*][b]Bullet Shield[/b] [*][b]Mech Drop Beacon[/b] [*][b]Ship Part[/b] [*][b]Smoke Spewer[/b] [/list]
You can disenchant [b]RimCards[/b] to get [b]RimCard Dust[/b] using the [b]Disenchanting RimCard Table.[/b] You can craft RimCards with mechanoid Corpses and other ingredients using the [b]Crafting Rimcard Table.[/b] You can buy them from a dedicated [b]RimCards Trader[/b]. All RimCards exist in a [b]Shiny Version[/b] that cost more to buy from the RimCards Trader.
Once you collected all the cards from the Mechanoid [b]Expansion[/b], you can build the [b]RimCard Trophy[/b] for this extension. If you managed to collect all the shiny versions, you can build the [b]RimCard Shiny Trophy.[/b]
-------------------

Let me know if there's a problem, spelling errors, or if you would like to see more [b]RimCards[/b] ! I'll regularly check.
[b]Hope you enjoy it. Stokovski.[/b]
